H.name: Hydrogen
H.info: Made for the bubbly bubbles in Beringstern.

He.name: Helium
He.info: You can use this to be a balloon!

Be.name: Beryllium
Be.info: It's can be used for that little Rocky shopkeeper guy!

B.name: Boron
B.info: I'm pretty sure you can help that doctor in the... Beringstern Hospital?

C.name: Carbon
C.info: um... don't use this one on anybody

N.name: Nitrogen
N.info: yeah... don't use this one either... unless you wanna make a weapon

O.name: Oxygen
O.info: Put this in a helmet to breathe in outer space. I wonder if there is a way to get there...

Ne.name: Neon
Ne.info: Hey, I heard a robot on Fruit Flower Dr. needs that for some help.

Na.name: Sodium
Na.info: You can use this for the Gadget Shop.
Na.no_gadget_unlocked_info: You can use this for the ???????

Al.name: Aluminum
Al.info: Can be used to make a choky weapon.

Cl.name: Chlorine
Cl.info: A salty substance, so you shouldn't use too much in the pool.
